card1.name: Rakhmonjon Khamidov
card1.desc: Within 4 years, I have been working in the education sector, helping students pursue their ambitions of studying overseas. Holding both a Bachelor’s and a Master’s degree from INKHA University in South Korea, I bring a strong international perspective and academic expertise to my role.
card1.desc2: At RF Consulting, I assist students in selecting suitable universities and majors, while also providing guidance on applications and visa procedures. I actively collaborate with parents as well, ensuring they are engaged and supported throughout their child’s academic journey.

card2.name: Aslonov Bahrom
card2.desc: At RF Consulting, I work alongside students to help them navigate their academic journey and choose the universities and courses best suited to their ambitions. By drawing on my understanding of international education systems, I provide tailored guidance that makes the application process smoother and more effective. I also collaborate with parents to ensure they feel confident and engaged throughout the decision-making process. Beyond this, I support students in drafting compelling motivation letters and Statements of Purpose (SOPs) that showcase their strengths and enhance their chances of admission.

card3.name: Iroda Khamidova
card3.desc: As CEO of RF Consulting, I am dedicated to guiding students through every step of their academic journey abroad. From selecting the right university and major to completing applications and securing visas, I ensure students receive the support they need to succeed.
card3.desc2: With more than 4 years of experience in the education field, a Master’s degree from Northeastern University London (UK), and professional certification from ICEF, I bring both academic insight and proven expertise to the field of international education consulting. At RF Consulting, my mission is to simplify complex processes, empower students with the right choices, and open doors to global opportunities.

card4.name: Texron
card4.desc: As an IT Programmer at RF Consulting, I am responsible for managing and maintaining our digital systems to ensure smooth operations. I also interact directly with students through our online platforms, providing technical assistance and support whenever needed.
card4.desc2: By combining technical expertise with a student-focused approach, I help create a reliable and efficient system that supports both our team and the students we serve.

citys.desc: Our expert team provides study abroad consultation for ambitious students. Our certified education consultants are trusted specialists in immigration services who will help you achieve positive results in your case. We provide study abroad and immigration services worldwide.

card1.title: USA
card1.desc1: The United States is home to the world’s top universities and offers students an outstanding education recognized globally. With thousands of programs across every field, you can choose from prestigious institutions such as Harvard, MIT, Stanford, and many more.
card1.desc2: Students also have access to numerous scholarships and financial aid options, making education in the U.S. more affordable. Studying in America provides not only academic excellence but also opportunities for research, internships, and building an international career.

card2.title: Canada
card2.desc1: Canada is one of the most welcoming destinations for international students, offering high-quality education at globally recognized universities such as the University of Toronto, McGill, UBC, and many more.
card2.desc2: With a wide range of scholarships and government support programs, studying in Canada is both affordable and rewarding. Students also benefit from diverse cultural experiences, safe living environments, and post-graduation work opportunities that can lead to permanent residency.

card3.title: United Kingdom
card3.desc1: The UK is home to some of the world’s most prestigious universities, including Oxford, Cambridge, Imperial College London, and many more. Students can choose from a wide range of high-quality degree programs that are globally recognized and valued by employers.
card3.desc2: With excellent scholarship opportunities such as the Chevening Scholarship, Commonwealth Scholarship, and university-specific awards, studying in the UK can be both affordable and rewarding. The UK also offers a rich cultural experience and the chance to build an international career through post-study work opportunities.

card4.title: Australia
card4.desc1: Australia is a leading destination for international students, known for world-class universities such as the University of Melbourne, ANU, and the University of Sydney. With a wide range of programs, cutting-edge research opportunities, and a vibrant multicultural environment, students receive an education that is globally respected.
card4.desc2: Generous scholarships and grants, including the Australia Awards and university-specific funding, help make studies more affordable. Australia also offers strong post-graduation work opportunities, opening pathways to international careers and permanent residency.

card5.title: China
card5.desc1: China is becoming a top destination for international students, with prestigious universities such as Tsinghua, Peking, and Fudan offering world-class education. Tuition fees and living costs are generally more affordable compared to many Western countries, while universities provide a variety of scholarships and funding options directly for international students.
card5.desc2: Studying in China allows you to experience a unique blend of ancient culture and modern innovation, gain valuable language skills, and build career opportunities in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.

card6.title: Italy
card6.desc1: Italy offers students the chance to study at some of the oldest and most prestigious universities in the world, such as the University of Bologna, Sapienza University of Rome, and Politecnico di Milano. Programs are available in English and Italian, covering a wide range of disciplines.
card6.desc2: International students can benefit from generous scholarships, tuition fee reductions, and regional grants, making higher education in Italy highly affordable. Alongside academic excellence, students enjoy Italy’s rich culture, history, and lifestyle in one of Europe’s most inspiring destinations.
